articles.title: Stock markets rise, bitcoin hits high as Trump returns
articles.author: Anthony Kwan
articles.summary: European and Asian stock markets rose on Monday and bitcoin soared to a new high. Donald Trump prepared to re-enter office as president of the world's biggest economy.
